attributes.action: Call a Re-think on EU Treaty if June Polls are bad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: June the biggest sign of people power from every nation which is apart of the EU will vote in the Euro Elections . This could be a clear sign how out of the touch the EU is with the people of the different nations of Europe.If the polls are bad toward the EU Then Gordon Brown should re-think the Treaty approach by his goverment as the first steps in getting back in touch with his own people
